welcomeMessage: Where direct democracy shapes self-regulated communities. Discuss, propose, and vote to build our future together.
seedSuccessDescRefresh: Database seeded! You may need to refresh to see all changes.
login.descDefault: Log in to continue to Kratia Forums.
login.descPendingAdmission: The admission application for {{username}} is currently under review by the community.
login.descEmailNotVerified: A verification email has been sent to {{email}}. Please check your inbox and click the link to verify your email address before logging in.

confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.title: Verify Your Email
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.descri: A verification link has been sent to {{email}}. Please check your inbox (and spam folder) to activate your Kratia account.
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.toComp: to complete your admission request to the community.
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.title: Application Submitted!
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.descrip: Your application to join Kratia Forums has been successfully submitted. It is now pending review and votation by the community.
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.whatNex: You will be notified of the outcome. In the meantime, you can explore public content as a visitor.
confirmPage.default.title: Confirmation
confirmPage.default.description: Please check the status or follow instructions provided.

proposeConstitution.pageDescription: Submit a proposal to modify the site's Norms & Conditions. Your proposal will create a public votation in the Agora.
proposeConstitution.form.proposalTitlePl: e.g., Update to Article 3 regarding Karma System
proposeConstitution.form.justificationPl: Explain the reasons for this proposed change and its benefits.
proposeConstitution.form.proposedTextPla: Paste the entire current constitution here and make your modifications. Your proposal will replace the current text if approved.
proposeConstitution.form.proposedTextHel: Carefully review your proposed text. If approved, this will become the new official constitution.
proposeConstitution.importantNotice.desc: Submitting this proposal will create a public votation in the Agora. Ensure your proposed text is complete and well-considered.

I propose a sanction of **{{duration}}** for user **{{username}}**.

**Justification:**
{{justification}}

This proposal is now subject to community votation.
